Attacks.Name: Bite
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, this character gains power equal to the damage dealt.

Attacks.Name: Rock Slide
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, this character gains power equal to the damage dealt.

Superpowers.Name: Guts
Superpowers.Effect: If Larvitar has a special condition, it gains +1 strength to its attacks.

Superpowers.Name: Rock Skin
Superpowers.Effect: When Larvitar is targeted by a attack of a enemy character within Range 1, reduce the damage by 1, to a minimum of 1.

Attacks.Name: Stomp
Attacks.Effect: If a critical and a wild are rolled, this attack has a Stun effect.

Superpowers.Name: Evolution
Superpowers.Effect: Replace this character with a Pupytar character of the same injured status. The new character begins with damage equal to the damage on this character and power equal to the power on this character.
